document.full_text: australian actor chris hemsworth, current king of the north american box office with the superhero movie "thor," is in negotiations to join kristen stewart in "show white and the huntsman."
document.title: "thor" star in talks to join "snow white" movie
lines_and_colors: australian actor chris hemsworth, current king of the north american box office with the superhero movie "thor," is in negotiations to join kristen stewart in "show white and the huntsman."
